name: The Annals of Psychical Science (IAPSOP)
content:
The Annals of Psychical Science (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: The Annals of Psychical Science Summary: From Pat Deveney's database: Annals of Psychical Science, The. A Monthly Journal Devoted to Critical and Experimental Research in the Phenomena of Spiritism. 1905-1910 Monthly, then quarterly London, England. Publisher: Office of the Annals. Editor: Cesare de Vesme, Lauri I. Finch. 1/1, January 1905-9/54, April-June 1910. This is the English-language version of Annales des Sciences Psychique. Contributions by Charles Richet, Ernesto Bozzano, Ernest Bozzano, et al. A table of contents for the first year has been compiled by the Campbell Theosophical Research Library of Sydney, Australia, and published online at http://116.0.17.135/indices/ANPSSC.HTM. Crabtree 1548. LOC; NYPL; Columbia University; Cornell University; SUNY, Buffalo; University of Rochester; San Francisco Public Library; Boston Athenaeum; and many other locations in OCLC. IssuesVolume 1, Jan-June 1905 Volume 2, Jul-Dec 1905 Volume 3, Jan-June 1906 Volume 4, Jul-Dec 1906 Volume 5, Jan-June 1907 Volume 6, Jul-Dec 1907 Volume 7, Jan-Dec 1908 Volume 8, Jan-Mar 1909 Volume 8, Apr-Jun 1909 Volume 8, Jul-Sep 1909 Volume 8, Oct-Dec 1909
